mapper.select: SELECT NVL( (SELECT MAX(pay_date) FROM acc_book_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId}), (SELECT setting_date - INTERVAL '1' DAY from member_finance_info WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND use_yn = 'Y') ) AS latest_pay_date FROM dual
SELECT NVL(SUM(price),0) FROM acc_book_history WHERE pay_date BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(#{payDate},'MM'),'YYYYMMDD') ) AND (LAST_DAY(#{payDate})) AND member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT to_char(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM') as pay_date_month , SUM(case input_output when 'GB1' THEN price ELSE 0 END) INPUT_SUM , SUM(case input_output when 'GB1' THEN 0 ELSE nvl(price,0) END) OUTPUT_SUM , SUM(case input_output when 'GB1' THEN price ELSE nvl(price,0)*-1 END) PRICE FROM (SELECT trunc(pay_date, 'MM') pay_date , input_output , price FROM acc_book_history where member_id = #{memberId} AND PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType} AND trunc(pay_date) > LAST_DAY(add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'MM'),-12))) a , (SELECT add_months(trunc(sysdate,'MM'),-11) + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (trunc(sysdate) - add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'MM'),-11))) b where b.dt = a.pay_date(+) GROUP BY to_char(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY to_char(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM')
